node.title: 2025-09-26 Radio Arcane
node.displayName: Dead Of Night & The Dark Market feat. Ghost Cop
node.description:
Radio Arcane Presents Dead Of Night & The Dark Market featuring Ghost Cop and Stoneburner.

The Nightmare continues on Friday, September 26th as Dead Of Night & The Dark Market keep up the monthly grind of dark eclectic music. Come out and help keep the dancefloor barely alive as we celebrate the glum drudgery of our dreadful existence.

This month will feature:

  • Ghost Cop (New York City) https://ghostcopnyc.bandcamp.com
  • Stoneburner (Baltimore) https://stoneburnerofficial.bandcamp.com
  • Radio Arcane Dark Music Specialists - Count Grozny, Gothic Bastard, Motuvius Rex
  • Vending by the talented Dark Market.
  • Food - The Gingerbread Hag
  • Drinks by the enchanting Lany StarDust & Smooth T

18+
$10 Advanced tickets
$15 Day of show

node.title: 2025-10-31 Arcane Alive
node.description:
Radio Arcane presents Dark Castle Fest 2025

Friday, October 31, 2025
Ak’chamel • Amulet • Witchhands • Va Va Vixens • Motuvius Rex • Lord Overstreet • Pas Musique

Saturday, November 1, 2025
Silver Rein • The Kentucky Vampires • Feyleux • Va Va Vixens • Dead Cool • Dark Mountain Orchid • Sinister Senile

More info about bands, etc.: https://www.darkcastlefest.com
node.shortDescription: Dark Castle Fest returns for another weekend of celebrating the darkly romantic music and arts of the very unique and beautiful Gothic underground!

node.title: 20 : La Procesión de lo Infinitio
node.description: Twentieth episode of Radio Arcane with hosts Brian Drabant, Motuvius Rex and AndrOspore : Featuring a discussion with South American Gothic Rock Romantics - La Procesión de lo Infinitio. We talk a bit about their history, process and life in their home city of Medellín, Colombia. Recorded from home studios as a production of Art Sanctuary in Louisville, KY.
node.shortDescription: Featuring a discussion with South American Gothic Rock Romantics - La Procesión de lo Infinitio.
